name: TempWarz
description:
This is my humble submission to the 2018 Godot Game Jam. Although I wrote the code myself, others helped me out with the graphics and sound effects, so I hope you check out the credits on the repository

All of the assets in the game, other than the open-source font used (DejaVu Sans), were created by hand, not taken from an online source.

You can view the source code here.

The game was developed and tested on Linux, is fully open source, and has Dvorak keyboard support, so although it might not be the best of games, it's certainly a diverse one

Tested on Gentoo Linux running the i3 desktop
